title: Site Released!
notes: The launcher is now publicly available for use by everyone!
Allowed users to choose between multiple versions of Eaglercraft to play.
Added availability for Eaglercraft Classic and Indev versions.
Made various UI improvements and bug fixes, increasing overall stability and performance.

title: Visual Bug Fixes & Optimizations
notes: Fixed various visual bugs affecting the launcher interface.
Optimized loading times and resource management.
Added "Screen size not supported" warning for incompatible browsers and devices.
Improved overall user experience with smoother animations and transitions.

title: Down URL "gavmc.com" Fixed
description: Resolved connectivity issues with the gavmc.com server.
notes: Fixed the down URL issue for gavmc.com, restoring access to related resources.
Improved error handling for server connectivity issues.
Replaced outdated links with current and functional URLs.
